japanese: （らいは……早く元気に……）
translation: (Raiha... Feel better, soon...)

japanese: お兄ちゃーん、おはよっ！
translation: Big brooo, good mornin'!

japanese: ――らいは！？
translation: %p-2;――%p; RAIHA?!

japanese: （……なんだ、夢か）
translation: (...Oh, it's a dream.)

japanese:
（外が明るいってことは、もう朝なのか。
　いつの間にか寝ちまってた……）
translation:
(It's already morning since it's bright outside.
 I must have fallen asleep without realizing it...)

japanese:
（らいはの様子を見に行かないと。
　夕べはあいつらに頼りっきりだったし――）
translation:
(I have to go check on Raiha's condition.
 I relied on those guys too much last night%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
フータロー！　起きて！
らいはちゃんが！！
translation:
Futaro! Wake up!
It's Raiha-chan!!

japanese: らいはがどうした！？
translation: What happened to Raiha?!

japanese: わ、私にも何がなんだか……とにかく早く来て！
translation:
I-I don't really understand...
Anyway, come quickly!
(It couldn't be!)

japanese: らいはっ！？
translation: Raiha?!

japanese:
わあっ！？
お兄ちゃん、びっくりさせないでよ。
translation:
WAAH?!
Big bro, don't scare me like that.

japanese: ……え？　らいは？
translation: ...Huh? Raiha?

japanese: おはよー、お兄ちゃん！
translation: Good mornin', big bro!

japanese:
おはよう……。
お前、起きて大丈夫なのか……？
translation:
Good morning...
Is it okay for you to be up like this...?

japanese:
うん。
なんか、もうスッキリしちゃった。
translation: Yep. I feel much better now, somehow.

japanese:
らいはちゃん、
目が覚めたらすっかり元気になってて……。
熱も、いつの間にか下がったみたい。
translation:
When Raiha-chan woke up,
she was completely energetic...
Her fever seems to have gone down too.

japanese:
はは……そうだったのか……。
なんだよ、驚かすなよ……。
translation:
Haha... Is that so...
Come on, don't surprise me like that...

japanese: また熱出しちゃったみたいで、ごめんね。
translation:
It looks like I got a fever yet again.
Sorry about that.

japanese:
まったく、無理するからだぞ。
でも治ってよかった……！
translation:
Geez, don't push yourself too hard.
But I'm glad you're feeling better...!

japanese:
わわっ！
ちょっと、お兄ちゃん！　苦しいよ！
三玖さんも見てるし、恥ずかしいから～！
translation:
Wawah!
Ouch, big bro! You're hurtin' me!
Miku-san is looking too! It's embaaarraaassing!

japanese:
フータロー、ずっと心配してたもんね。
本当に、元気になってよかった……。
translation:
Futaro, you were worried the entire time.
I'm so glad she's feeling better...

japanese: らいはちゃん！
translation: Raiha-chan!

japanese: 目が覚めたんですか！？
translation: Are you awake?!

japanese:
うん、もうすっかり元気だよ。
心配させちゃってごめんなさい。
translation:
Yes, I'm completely better now.
I'm really sorry for worrying you.

japanese: ううっ、元気になってよかったですぅ～！
translation: Ooohh, I'm SO HAPPY you're feeling better!

japanese:
ひゃあ！？
こ、今度は四葉さん！？
translation:
HYAAH?!
N-now you, Yotsuba-san?!

japanese:
こら、四葉！
らいはちゃんは病み上がりなのよ？
無理させない！
translation:
Hey, Yotsuba!
Raiha-chan is still recovering, isn't she?
Don't push her too hard!

japanese:
あはは……。
ごめん、勢いあまっちゃった。
translation:
Ahaha...
Sorry, I got carried away.

japanese:
うん、すっかり元気だね。
本当によかった。
translation:
Yeah, she's completely better now.
I'm really glad.

japanese:
あ、でも病院へは行こうか。
元気になったとは言え、
ちゃんと診てもらったほうがいいよ。
translation:
Oh, but we're still going to the hospital, right? 
Even if she's feeling better,
it's better to get checked.

japanese: ああ、そうだな。
translation: Yeah, that's true.

japanese:
けど、不思議だわ。
こんなに急に治っちゃうものなの？
translation:
But, it's strange.
Can someone really recover so suddenly like this?

japanese:
うーん、どうだろう？
夕べはなかなか熱が下がらなくて、
本当に心配だったんだけど。
translation:
Well, I don't know.
Last night, Raiha's fever wasn't going down,
and I was really worried.

japanese: ……あら？
translation: ...Huh?

japanese: どうしたの？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
いえ、置いておいた水晶が見当たらなくて……。
枕の下にでも入ってしまったのかと。
translation:
Um, I can't find the crystal I left here...
Is it under the pillow or something?

japanese:
本当だ。
私、ずっと看病してたけど気がつかなかった。
translation:
Oh, you're right.
I didn't notice it while I was taking care of her.

japanese:
……見当たりませんね。
どこへいってしまったのでしょう。
translation:
I can't find them anywhere.
Where did they go?

japanese: おい、水晶ってなんのことだ？
translation: Hey, what crystals are you talking about?

japanese:
夕べ、泉で見つけた水晶に、
らいはちゃんが元気になりますようにって
みんなで願掛けしたんですよ。
translation:
The crystals we found at the spring last night
and wished for Raiha-chan's quick recovery.

japanese:
えっ！？
水晶、見つけたんだ！
translation:
Huh?!
You found the crystals?!

japanese:
はい、それをらいはちゃんの枕元に
置いておいたのですが……。
translation:
Yes, and we left them by your pillow, Raiha-chan,
but...

japanese:
水晶が消えて、代わりに
らいはちゃんが元気になった……ってこと？
translation:
The crystals disappeared,
and instead,
you got better...is what happened?

japanese:
だったら、本当に不思議な力が宿ってたのかも！
力を使い切って消えちゃったとか！
translation:
If that's the case, then maybe there really was
some mysterious power! Maybe the crystals used up
all their power and disappeared!

japanese:
すごいですよ上杉さん！
伝説は本当だったんです！
translation:
Amazing, Uesugi-san!
The legend was true!

japanese: いや、違うだろ。
translation: No, it wasn't.

japanese:
ええー……。
これでも伝説を信じないんですか？
translation:
Wow...
You won't believe, even after 
something like THIS has happened?

japanese:
信じる信じないじゃない。
らいはが元気になったのは
水晶の力なんかじゃなくて――
translation:
It's not about believing or not.
It's not the power of the crystals
that made Raiha-chan better%p-2;――

japanese:
らいはを心配して、夜通しで看病してくれた
お前らのおかげだ。
translation:
It's because all of you stayed up all night
to take care of her, and worried about her.

japanese: 上杉君……。
translation: Uesugi-kun...

japanese: だよな、らいは？
translation: Right, Raiha?

japanese:
そっか、みんなが看病してくれたんだ。
ありがとうございました。
translation:
Oh, I see.
Everyone took care of me. Thank you very much.

japanese: いえいえっ！　そんな！
translation: No no! It's no trouble at all!

japanese: 当然のことなんだから、お礼なんていいわ。
translation:
It's something we'd do naturally,
so there's no need to thank us.

japanese:
そうそう。
元気になってくれたのなら、それでオッケーだよ。
translation:
That's right.
If she's feeling better now,
that's all that matters.

japanese:
（……そうだ。
　水晶といや確かポケットに……）
translation:
(...That's right.
 The crystal, it was in my pocket...)

japanese:
……あった。
らいは、ほら、これ。お前にやるよ。
translation:
...Here it is.
Raiha, here. I'll give this to you.

japanese:
水晶？
お兄ちゃんもちゃんと拾ってきてたんだ！
translation:
A crystal?
Big bro even picked one up!

japanese: えっ……！

ちょっとフー君？
どういうことよ、本当は拾ってたの？
translation:
Hey, Fu-kun?
What's going on? You really picked one up?

japanese:
まさか、私たちに黙っておいて、
あとでこっそり誰かに渡そうとしたんじゃ……。
translation:
You didn't secretly pick it up,
planning to give it to someone later...

japanese:
違う、変な想像をするな。
らいはを探しに行ったときに拾ったんだよ。
translation:
No, don't imagine anything weird.
I picked it up when I went to look for Raiha.

japanese: ああ、そうだったんですか。
translation: Oh, that's how it was then.

japanese: ……私がもらっちゃっていいの？
translation: ...Is it really okay if I take it?

japanese:
いいんだよ。
伝説なんて関係なく、俺がお前にやりたいんだ。
translation:
It's okay.
It doesn't matter if it's a legend or not.
I just want to give it to you.

japanese:
（きっと、らいはは俺がこいつらのうちの誰かに
　渡すことを望んでるんだろうが……）
translation:
(I'm sure Raiha wants me to give it
 to one of the quintuplets...)

japanese:
（すまん、俺にはまだわからないんだ。
　自分の気持ちも、どうすべきかも）
translation:
(Sorry, I still don't know.
 My own feelings, or what to do...)
Hmm...

japanese: ……どうした？
translation: ...What's up?

japanese:
ねえ、お兄ちゃん。
この水晶、看病してもらったお礼に
五月さんたちにあげてもいいかな？
translation:
Hey, big bro.
Can I give this crystal to Itsuki-san and the others
as a thank you for taking care of me?

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
まあ、もうお前の物だからな。
好きにしていい。
translation:
Well, it's already yours.
You can do whatever you want with it.

japanese: ですが……。
translation: But...

japanese: 看病してもらったお礼と、あと……。
translation: As a thank you for taking care of me, and also...

japanese:
私とお兄ちゃんをこの島に誘ってくれて、
たくさん楽しい想い出を作ってくれて、
ありがとうございました！
translation:
For inviting me and big bro to this island
and making so many fun memories with us.
Thank you very much!

japanese:
この水晶が、みんなとの想い出の
しるしになったらいいなって。
translation:
I was hoping this crystal could be a symbol
of our memories together.

japanese: らいはちゃん……。
translation: Raiha-chan...

japanese:
そう言われたら、
受け取らないわけにはいかないよね。
translation: If you say so, we can't refuse, can we?

japanese:
そうね。
島での想い出と一緒に、大切にしないと。
translation:
Well, yeah.
We have to cherish it
along with our memories of the island.

japanese:
うん！
みんなで過ごした時間の結晶だよ。
translation:
Yeah!
It's the crystallization of the time we spent together.

japanese: ありがとう、らいはちゃん。
translation: Thank you, Raiha-chan.

japanese: では、大切にさせていただきますね。
translation: I'll make sure to keep it safe.

japanese:
あと、それとね？
これからも、お兄ちゃんをよろしくお願いします。
translation:
Oh, and also?
Please take care of big bro from now on, too.

japanese:
もちろんよ！
フー君のことは私に任せて！
translation:
Of course!
Leave Fu-kun to us!

japanese: なんで二乃が返事してるの？
translation: Why are you the only one responding, Nino?

japanese: あら？　文句あるのかしら？
translation: Huh? You have a complaint?

japanese:
あ、あの、２人とも？
らいはちゃんの前ですからねー？
translation:
U-um, you two?
You're in front of Raiha, you know?

japanese:
というか前提がおかしいだろ。
俺が、お前らの面倒を見てるんだが？
translation:
Well, the premise is all wrong.
I'm the one who's taking care of you guys, right?

japanese:
いつもありがとうございます！
今後もご迷惑をおかけすることと思いますが、
なにとぞ、よろしくお願いいたします。
translation:
Thank you so much, as always!
We'll probably continue to cause you trouble
in the future, so please take care of us.

japanese: お前はお前で、迷惑かける前提か。
translation: You're already planning to do so, aren't ya?

japanese:
いやー、だって私たちって根っからのおバカだし？
ちゃんと卒業できるか、まだ油断できないと思うよ？
translation:
Well, we are just a bunch of airheads, you know?
I don't think we can let our guard down
until we graduate, yeah?

japanese:
自分で言うかっ！
そう思うのならちょっとでも勉強に励め！！
translation:
You said it yourself!
If you feel that way, then you should study harder!!

japanese:
あははっ！
お兄ちゃん、頑張ってね！
translation:
Ahaha!
Good luck, big bro!
